Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play with one another in NBA history during the Lakers' preseason loss to the Phoenix Suns.
Bronny James turned 20 on the same day he played with his father, and the Lakers celebrated him with a cake and cupcakes.
Others: LeBron James made a 3-pointer and an and-1 layup with Bronny on the floor.
Bronny did not score during the 4:09 minute stretch but was set up for a 3-pointer out of a dribble hand-off that he missed.
LeBron James told Bronny to keep getting better and focus on making winning plays and learning from his mistakes.
The Suns outscored the Lakers by four points during LeBron and Bronnyâ€™s shared time on the floor in the first half.
